outputs.output_descr: Promotion of the development of the wind energy market in Kazakhstan by assisting the Govrnemnt to formulate a ntional programme on wind energy developemnt; providing information for and building the local capacity to develop wind energy projects in Kazakhstan and to orginize financing for them; facilitating the construction of the first 5MW wind farm to prepare gground for and reduce the risks of further investments; and monitoring, analysing and dissemonating the experiences and lessons laerned during implmentation of the project.

Promotion of the development of the wind energy market in Kazakhstan by assisting the Govrnemnt to formulate a ntional programme on wind energy developemnt; providing information for and building the local capacity to develop wind energy projects in Kazakhstan and to orginize financing for them; facilitating the construction of the first 5MW wind farm to prepare gground for and reduce the risks of further investments; and monitoring, analysing and dissemonating the experiences and lessons laerned during implmentation of the project.

project_descr: Wind Power Market Development Initiative in Kazakhstan
